mapper.select: select r_id, r_title, r_contents, r_date, r_count, m_no, m_id, r_del, r_commend, pay_id, r_image from REVIEW join member using(m_no) where m_no = #{mNo} and r_del = 'N'

select r_id, r_title, r_contents, r_date, r_count, a.m_no, m_id, r_del, r_commend, c.pay_id, r_image from REVIEW A, member B, payment C, product_option D where a.m_no = b.m_no and a.pay_id = c.pay_id and c.o_no = d.o_no AND p_id = #{pId} and r_del = 'N' order by r_commend desc

select pay_id, p_id, price, p_status, pay_request, pay_date, count, delevery_status, p_name, storename, s_bphone, o_no, o_name from payment left join review using(pay_id) join PRODUCT_OPTION using(o_no) join product using(p_id) join seller using(s_no) where m_no = #{mNo} and DELIVERY_STATUS = '구매확정' and r_id is null
select * from review where r_id = #{rId] and r_del = 'N'
mapper.update: update review set r_count = r_count+1 where r_id = #{rId]
mapper.insert: insert into review values (review_seq.nextval, #{rTitle}, #{rContents}, default, default, #{mNo}, default, default, #{payId}, #{rImage})
mapper.delete: delete from REVIEW_COMMEND where r_id = #{rId} and m_no = #{mNo}
mapper.select: select r_r_id, m_no, m_id, r_r_contents, r_r_date, r_r_del, r_id from REVIEW_REPLY join member using(m_no) where r_id = #{rId} and R_R_DEL = 'N' order by r_r_date
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW_REPLY values (REVIEW_REPLY_seq.nextval, #{mNo}, #{rrContents}, default, default, #{rId})
